description.value:
Receives, validates, and stores a bundle of related EHealthObservation, EHealthMedia and EHealthQuestionnaireResponse.
Supplied EHealthProvenance must reference other resources in same bundle. To reference a resource the id of the resource to target has to have the format "urn:oid:<the oid>" or "urn:uuid:<the uuid>". The eHealth infrastructure will substitute the id when saving the resources.
This method is intended for uploading single measurements. Uploading large batches of resources is considered misuse.
All input resources should reference the same patient and episode of care. The eHealth infrastructure will implicitly add a Provenance resource targetting all resources received in the same measurement bundle.
